com.codecool.shop.model

Class ShoppingCart

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codecool.shop.model.ShoppingCart

  • public class ShoppingCart
extends java.lang.Object
    The ShoppingCart class represents a customer's cart with the cartContent, totalPrice and cartSize attributes.
